item.title: How do packets find their way back?
item.description: In one of my previous posts, I studied how traffic flows when using Kubernetes Services. While drawing the last diagram, I did not clearly see how traffic could make its way back to the user. In this post, I focus on how packets find their way back and what makes stateless rewriting interesting.
